content.detailedDescription: I am a bus operator for san diego transit and was was driving down la jolla blvd. north bound at approx 7:40. i am believer in ufos and constantly look to the sky's while driving the bus at night. i see airplanes and helicopters all the time while driving. what's interesting is that i always look for the orange orb as opposed to the brite airplane lights. as i'm driving i observe what appears to be a orange glow in the sky. la jolla blvd has round about circles in this area so as i look up and make the turns the glow comes in and out of view because of trees and buildings. i the think to myself that it's one of those chinese lanterns until i realized it was coming towards me as opposed to floating. this is our of character for me but against company policy i pulled the bus over at a bus stop located at bird rock ave. even tho there was no one at the stop. i stepped off the bus and took off my hat and watched the glow. it looked like the orange orb that i have heard so many ufo enthusiast talk about. as i watched it travel south it it seemed to disappear and re-appear as the glow pulsated out and then back. i then look north and saw a plane that appeared smaller the the orb. seconds later it went out again but this is when i observed the object. even tho the glow went out i could still see a round grayish object moving at a high rate of speed southbound. i watched it as it flew and realized i needed to get back on the bus and did not wait for it to vanish from my site.
content.summary: Driving bus north on la jolla blvd at bird rock ave, saw orange orb coming towards me, stopped bus to get out and look, brite object pulsated and went out, saw round grayish round object moving fast

content.detailedDescription:
The object first appeared as bright planet however none identified in area of sky. i tried to use my go-to telescope to identify it as a planet but my telescope did not recognize the object as anything defined in its database. at first it was stationary and appeared high in southern sky and in same proximity as the moon during that time of the evening. it slowly descended in a northernly direction. the object then hovered to the west of my ranch for 30 minutes and occasionally moved in a quick, abrupt fashion, both up and down and side to side. i would describe the object as orb like, with bright red and orange glow. my property is located in the bmoa (brownwood military operations area)and i routinely see jet fighters and helicopters performing exercises in the area. during these events there is much noise from the engines. this object made no sound as it moved. te craft slowly traveled to the west which is in the same direction of dyess afb in abilene, texas. 

the object again appeared the following night, december 31st approximately the same time in the evening (8pm) and acted in a similar fashion. i do not believe the object to be a weather balloon as it was giving off its own light not reflecting light from another source. the object seemed to hover above the tree line about 150- 200 feet. no other aircraft in the area at the time either military or civilian.

i tried to use my call phone camera to take pictures however the craft was about a half mile from my location and therefore nothing appeared in the pictures which i took.
content.summary: Appeared high in sky like a bright planet however no planets in that area of sky.

content.detailedDescription: While driving north on hwy 97, almost to hwy 31 junction, a light which looked like a plane turning to land on an airstrip suddenly shot easternly like a shooting star. it turned to a bright green light, then looked like it had sparks shooting out the back...Only two sparks though. it slowed a bit, then disappeared behind the cover of trees blocking my view.
content.summary: Looked like a plane turning to land. light from white to green then sparks out of back

content.detailedDescription:
This was written yesterday-i still cannot get the videos to upload onto this site-the video of the lights is supposed to show up on youtube shortly- search under {youtube title moved to fi section/cms/tg]
   
   my 12 yr old and i witnessed stationary lights in the sky again above oswego, il today. it was the same place and time of day as last november's sighting, 3:25pm in the western sky. the sun was getting lower in the sky and there were scattered clouds, though the sky was mostly sunny. the conditions were very similar to our sighting in november. one light appeared to the lower right (west) of the sun and the other was farther to the right (slightly northwest). we only saw them for a minute and then lost them and had to keep driving.
   when i got to our home, about a mile away, i got out our sony handycam and caught the lights on it. the stationary lights were in the clouds directly west, to the right of the setting sun, and the lights were lower and bigger than the airplanes that were present before and after. i focused in on one light 2 minutes into the first video and it appeared almost a triangular shape with fuzzy edges and it was a glowing reddish-pink on the top point, white in the center and green on the bottom two points. i was inside and there is dirt on the window. the video is shaky but if you pause on it you can really see the colors. i didn't know it at the time but i also caught three lights later in the video.
   these objects were stationary, not airplanes, as i was also watching and comparing them to airplanes with their contrails. there were no helicopters or small planes in the area when the lights appeared. 
   as i was looking at the second video i noticed that i caught what appears to be a dark disc skipping across the sky at minute 2:59. i don't think it was a bird because in the same area are geese with wings flapping and this was circular and much, much faster.
   also, in the third video a dark helicopter flew by about 20 minutes after the lights were filmed, about 10 minutes after the disc. 
   right after the events our wii froze and wouldn't turn off, has never happened before, and our cell phone wasn't responding when we wanted to play songs, which also hasn't happened before. i am also having problems sending this, have tried twice and it isn't working. the video files in my email also aren't working.
   strange events here in oswego today!
content.summary: Oswego, il unknown lights in sky, also possible disc

content.detailedDescription: My sister and i were driving down the highway going back home when i noticed it in the sky. it was beautiful, and flashed a white light, pulsated for a quick second, slowly hovered to my right and then disappeared. it was my first sighting, and even though it was not that crazy of one, it left me in awe.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Extremely bright. pulsated white lights. slowly moved to my right then vanished

content.detailedDescription: On the night of december 17, 2009 i was outside sky watching.  southwest from my house i noticed what looked to be 2 pulsating fireballs. they were stationary for about 30 seconds total.  i started filming and was able to catch a few seconds of it on film. it made no noise and it never moved.  it vanished suddenly and i never saw it again.
content.summary: 2 pulsating fireballs that suddenly disappear.

content.detailedDescription: On the evening of january 23, 2009 at approximately 6:21pm i went outside to do some sky watching.  i quickly noticed a bright light just above the horizon northeast of dublin. i always have video camera in hand, so i started filming.  the object was stationary for a few seconds and then suddenly started moving to the right in a straight line.  i watched it through the trees as i was filming.  it went behind the telephone pole and disappeared just on the other side of the pole.
content.summary: Bright orange stationary light.  then moves to the right and disappears.

content.detailedDescription: From albany ny: i was outside 6:15 to 6:30am looking for any meteor shower activity and taking my dog out. it was early dawn and the sun hadn't risen yet. i saw what appeared to be a plane in the distance. i am in the flight path of planes departing albany airport. the object was traveling north to south i'd say 30 degrees in the horizon. i thought it might have been a twin engine plane by the span of lights. i watched the object get closer and i noticed the object didn't climb but moved straight like a helicopter closer and closer. then i noticed no flashing light and no sound. just a smooth constant slow movement closer and closer. i realized it was something i've never seen before. i just observed and studied the object and it looked to me like 3 brightly colored arms attached in the center spread out equally like a 3 pointed star. the object was 500-1000 feet in the air i suppose. it was so close and i was ready for the object to pass overhead but a tree in my yard blocked my view and that's how i lost sight of it. it should have passed over me and i was sort of frustrated that it didn't. it just dissappeared from sight but it wasn't an illusion and this wasn't imaginary. i honestly did see this.
content.summary: 3 arm star shape glowing brightly and moving low and silent 30 foot diameter

content.detailedDescription: It was jan 3, 2012 about 8:25pm. i was driving from southampton pa to rockledge pa, heading south on rt232, second street pike. for 15 min i observed a bright white light in the sw sky.  it was a steady light in the sky that appeared to be brighter than a star or satellite. as i drove down the pike through various turns the light remained bright, and not dimming.This i thought to be unusual.I crossed over philmont ave and noticed that it was closer to me now in the sky. within 45 seconds i noticed 5 bright white lights in a straight line just above the tree line and approaching me. i pulled over my car and got out. i observed these bright lights as it flew directly over me. it was a clear night and what i saw was a triangular shaped craft with a red and green light in the front center of the craft. also were two sets of bright white lights on what appeared to be its wings. it was about 500 yards directly above me. it sounded like a low engine noise and was flying at about 50 mph. i thought that it might be a government plane. however i lived within 3 miles of willow grove air base for 36 years and never seen anything like that nor was this a normal flight path for aircraft.I'm not sure what it was but i was excited to see it. i tried to get a picture of it with my phone, but i was to fixated on the object. i eventually lost sight of it as it past over the tree line.
content.summary: Triangle shape, 2 lights in center ,1 red, 1 green. 2 white lights on each wing.

content.detailedDescription: Let me begin by saying that i am an avid sky-watcher. the area i live in (western suburbs of chicago) i see multiple objects in the sky at night. i am also someone who believes unless there is an overwhelming observance with extreme visual evidence that there is more than likely a logical explanation. most of the objects i see at night i would most likely classify as satellites. while some of them have acted interesting to say the least, no observance or sighting has ever blown my socks off, until last week! i was returning from picking my wife up from work so it was about 5:15 chicago time, and visually it was about dusk, so it was still plenty of light with darkness setting in. we simultaneously saw a bright light descending in the sky rapidly, then broke of in to two, and disappeared, to which i exclaimed holy s&*$! my wife then said "what was that!? i couldn't explain it. i have since been leaning towards the explanation of it being a meteorite. based on its path which was almost directly down at close to a 90 degree angle, and the fact it was fairly light out, it would not be like any meteorite i have ever scene, but as far as logical explanations, that would have to be what it was. case solved! until this morning, again with my wife, thank god. driving my wife to work at 7:15 am, we both witness something that i cannot find a logical explanation for. headed west on rt 72 near elgin il, out of the front window and slightly to the right which is south, we saw a burst of light similar to that of a camera flash. this light descended straight down as if on a rope rapidly. in my opinion and these are all estimations, the light descend from the elevation of about 3000 ft to about 100 ft in a fraction of a second and was gone. if my wife hadn't immediately reacted to the sighting i would have absolutely thought i had imagined it. i know this is not a triangle vehicle doing loopedy loops in the sky but it is something i cannot explain. what also is intriguing to me is it proximity to our last sighting, in the same general area. it will continue to puzzle me thus the reason i share this story. it is the first time i have ever posted on this sight. keep your eyes to the skies my friends.
content.summary: Bright light descending rapidly.

content.detailedDescription:
I officially saw my first ufo!.... i was walking my dogs in the back yard, and i thought someone shot off a roman candle from across the water from the other neighborhood. it was a brilliant orange/amber orb with color flickering. it made no sound at all and was very beautiful. it was about 300-400 feet above me and i followed it till it disappeared to the east. a few seconds later another orb followed the same exact path rising from out of the tree line area across the water like the first one did. i couldn't get over how close it was and how quiet it was. i kept thinking it might be a helicopter with a spotlight, but the object was flickering/glowing and totally silent as it passed overhead and then faded into the east.


i was very excited and thrilled when i was watching this event, i was not scared but amazed how brilliant and bright in color the object was.  i kept squinting my eyes trying to focus on the object to make out what it really was, but the object was to bright.
content.summary: Vero beach sighting...I officially saw my first ufo!.... i was walking my dogs in the back yard, and i thought someone shot off a roman candle from across the water from the other neighborhood.

content.detailedDescription:
At about 5am i went to the back of my home and attempted to see if i could see the forecasted meteor shower. however when looking to the north of my position, i saw with the eye (no glasses) an object far off and not to high from the horizon ( i assume) and was sparkling. my pinky could cover the sighting from my position, so, don't know how far away or big the object was.  because it was cold when i viewed it with a bushnell 7x15x35 binoculars it was hard to see clearly because of it being cold and i was shaking.  however, i was able to distinclty see the colors of random, no pattern flashing of white, red, green, and yellow (as i tried to remember).
i have viewed many aircraft and choppers (retired military) and know that lights can be blinking red or white, and alternately, however, these where flashing randomly, not in a pattern, and they were not pulsating.  however the colors were very identifiable, crisp and clear, even from my distance.
i went out several times on the third time to check i wore glasses, and could see the colors even more clearly. i went back outside for a look at 6am, and the object was gone. 
-------------------------------nothing follows---------------------------
content.summary: Veiwing meteor shower with binocculars, saw interesting lights.

content.detailedDescription: At about 2:30 am while watching the sky in my backyard; waiting for the meteor shower to begin my wife and i witnessed a triangle shaped object fly overhead from north to south. it was flying very low and was silent. it did not have lights. there was 3 white, round shapes at each point of the triangle. it moved extremely fast. when we first saw it coming toward us we thought it may have been a meteor, or maybe a flock of birds until it was directly over our heads. the object flew in a straight line. when we realized it was not birds or a meteor we were stunned. it left us scratching our heads as to what we had just witnessed. we lost sight of the object as it flew south past the tall trees.
content.summary: In georgia watching meteor shower. we saw a silent triangle shaped flying object .

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were outside trying to watch the quadrantid meteor shower. we saw a couple meteors go by and we were about to go back in. as i was watching the sky i saw a triangular object come into view with five dim orange lights. i yelled for my husband to look and he looked up and saw it also. this craft made absolutely no sound. it was dead quiet outside and we heard nothing as this craft went by. we observed the craft for about 20 seconds as it traveled south east until it was out of site. both of our reactions were we felt like it was not something of human origin. i was in almost total shock when we came back in the house, shocked that i saw something like this so close.
content.summary: Triangle shape ufo observed making no sound , flying low and slow , and flying on a straight path

content.detailedDescription:
I was in and out since 12 pm (aprox) observing any meteors that might be passing.  about 1:29 pm i noticed an object flashing above the tree line.  i am out often at night and 
i have observed planes, satelites etc...This was different. 

 i observed the starlike object flash off and on...With seconds between flashes.  when it was not flashing it was not observed.  the object occationally and randomly changed directions with some of the flashes.  that is to say it would flash then appear up from where it had been.  flash--down from where it had been...It also moved diagonally left and right between some flashes.  the movement appeared random. ( but all within a distinct area above the tree line)

twice the object flashed and seemed to be behind a small cloud that reflected the flash...The reflection was three times the size of the original object, hazy and lasted a good second...Fading away instead of seeming to turn off and on the way it had before.  

the object stayed in the same location appox 10 minutes.  disappeared for several minutes and reappeared in the same location.  it flashed for 5 to 6 minutes more before it stopped.  the stop was sudden and even though i searched the night sky i did not see it anywhere else.  my husband observed the object with me for a good 5 minutes.  ( he went inside due to the "intense" cold of the night. 25ish degrees)
content.summary: Star like object flashing , changing directions rapidly

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and three of our friends were outside smoking on the balcony when they told me it was happening. i went outside. i at first thought they were planes landing at d.I.A. however the did not move and were not blinking. more showed up and were also stationary. some vanished and then they made a v formation. then they made a line going from the ground up. my friendly.D and i attempted to drive closer but by the time we got to a in-lit area they were all gone. they were right above the airport where the airplanes take off. so we knew they were not planes waiting to land. and while they were their no planes were leaving or landing. it was the most amazing thing i have ever seen in my life i was so excited i could hardly breath. my thoughts were going a million miles a second it was intense.
content.summary: Lights that appeared and dissapeared making a v formation and then a strait line. smaller dimer ones apeared and vanishid.

content.detailedDescription:
These pictures were taken last night, this orb was hovering there just above the clouds for around 30mins or so. it would pulsate a bright golden color then dissapear and appear in the same spot.

it also went from a bright light to a small dot then back again.

i was watching it the whole time and in the middle of doing this it appeared to go very bright and 2 or 3 small lights appeared beneath almost as if they dropped from it.

the pictures a high def so you can zoom in.

also i have noticed that every time i step outside late at night over the post few months there are a couple of light flashes noticeable to the eye, do you know anything about this? 

i have more pictures of the orb also.
content.summary: Ufo orb sighting 3/1/2012. melbourne australia- pictures

content.detailedDescription:
Iba entrando a un restaurant y de repente voltee hacia arriba y vi este objeto,la fotograf���a fue desde un celular de baja definici���n (640 x 480), a la vista del espectador se aprecia perfectamente bien, pero al captarlo con mi celular solo se distingue una l���nea horizontal muy tenue.

es mi segundo avistamiento.
content.summary: Estático y muy visible

content.detailedDescription:
Driving from limon, co to colorado springs, co observed light in distance, sw in-line, appeared that is, in-line with highway 24.  about 10-15 degrees above horizon.  multi-colored with no pattern of lights and unclear if they were same lights always on or cycling colors.  we were driving towards colorado springs and object was far off towards colorado springs.  object appeared to hover, we guess just east of colorado springs.  then it moved slowly in what appeared a north direction and downwards like a landing plane but extremely slow.  way to slow to be a plane.  we observed one plane in the sky to the south of us a few miles but no other aircraft visible and we compared the plane to the object and it was completely different.  it did not appear to be a helicopter either as we have seen many of those before and this did not have any of the characteristics of a helicopter.  as we watched it we were driving but we could tell it was moving extremely slow and hovering then it started dropping downwards, straight down and just above the horizon it stopped and simply vanished.  at this point we were about 45 miles from colorado springs and had been watching the object about 20 minutes.  as we scanned the sky we started to see aircraft appear.  these were easy to identify as planes, in facts jets, as they moved very fast but had typical aircraft flashing lights on and maneuvered like an aircraft.  no sudden drops or rises in their path and they turned gently like you would expect a plane and again, the lights on these were clear and easy to match to planes we have seen before.  i would guess fighter jets based on their movements and speed.  we observed these jets appear from the se, e, n, and ne.  5 in total and they all flew into the area we last saw the object that vanished.  they circled the area in wide gentle arcs then they flew off in different directions.  2 stayed behind and continued to circle the area between pueblo, colorado springs and south of denver. (this is a guess based on the paths we saw them fly)  they did this for about 15 - 25 minutes.  as we were watching the 5 jets come in then circle and fly off and then watch just the 2 jets we saw to the n of colorado springs a bright white orb like object in the sky.  it flashed like lightning would but it was just an orb, way off in the distance, and was only there for a second.  unable to explain either one.  the second could have been a natural something, but it was not stormy.  scattered clouds but mostly clear sky.  the first object we could not figure out.  did not match any plane we have ever seen, nor helicopter we have ever seen.  we have seen thousands of these fly at night as we have lived by an airport for 10 years.  this first object hovered in place and moved way to slow to be a fixed wing craft and did not behave like any helicopter.  lastly, it just vanished followed within seconds by 5 jets appearing in the area from different directions.  

must remain anonymous....
content.summary: Light in night sky that changed colors hovering then moved then vanished followed by second white orb then lots of planes

content.detailedDescription: In tustin ca on chrsitmas eve day, 8:30 am while painting grecian column structure in backyard swimming pool area, my painting partner placed a ladder looking up to do so. and said, "what are those things?" i looked up in the direction he was telling me, and saw nothing, and told him i didnt see anything. with in two min. i placed my ladder on the structure, an looked up the ladder rails like a rifle sight, and instantly saw these two metallic rectangular-ish objects stationary close together but not touching. i called out excitedly, "i see them! i see them!" i looked for approx. a minute, noted the rectangular shape slight metallic glint when sun hit it. the other one had no reflection. my partner asked, "are we seeing a ufo?" i said if its still there in five minutes, this could be trouble. this was the end of our sighting. what is strange to me is im an avid fan about anything ufo. i watch ancient aliens, ufo hunters, sightings, destination truth, ghost adventures, ghost hunters and such. ive never seen, felt, or heard a ufo. with as much interest as i have, i felt a little strange looking at it and felt possibly whatever i was looking at, knew i was looking at it. this lead me to return to my work and for some reason never looked up after the five minutes, or the two hours we were there for work. told my family on christmas day and the possibility that it could be sky lab and shuttle, or something like that. we fly rc airplanes and are constantly plane spotting and identifying aircraft. these two stationary objects were twice as high as cruising comm. aircraft, but still in naked eye visibility. this could be a totally explainable sighting, but i still felt compelled to say something to somebody.
content.summary: Two metallic stationary objects double cruising altitude of comm. jets, not touching but close together, one rectangular and reflective, other not so rectangular and dull.

content.detailedDescription:
I was heading east on my motorcycle on 30th street towards i5 about 5:50 pm, it was a clear, dark  evening with stars visible. i saw a ufo hovering  near the highway southeast of lane comm. college near the bonneville power station towers near goshen, or.  it appeared to be a triangle shaped craft.  i was on my motorcycle so i pulled over halfway down the 30th st. hill to get a better look. it appeared to be  hovering, then it began moving slowly to the west.  i noticed a small ball of white light paralleling its course, slightly higher and farther to the south.  the larger craft was approximately 1000 feet high.

 there were three white lights; two on the rear of the triangular shape, one near the front at the narrowest, leading edge.  i first thought it was a plane because there was a pulsating red light
coming from the top and a yellowish light in the center bottom, but then i realized that all three of the bright white lights were pointed towards the ground, not forward, like landing lights would normally be positioned. 

the three lights shining straight down washed out the detail of the silhouette of the ufo but i could make out that it was delta shaped.  i heard no noise from either object.  it disappeared over the trees after about two minutes time.
content.summary: Triangular ufo with lights hovered over electric station near i5, then moved westerly direction paralleled by small orb

content.detailedDescription:
Background: northern il, cold night, mostly clear sky under a slight chemtrail haze.
i noticed an enormous ring around the moon which caught my attention. i realized it was just due to chemtrail haze but a strange sight nonetheless. it looked like a giant clock face in the night sky with the moon in the center. i noticed what appeared at first to be a very, very bright star at approximately 7 o'clock in relation to the moon. i then saw it moving across the sky like a satellite or something so didn't think too much about it. several minutes later i saw it at approximately 5 o'clock, still didn't think much about it. i was working so i was doing some computer work in my truck (i work outside) and started staring at the bright object. it seemed to have stopped moving for more than several minutes. out of nowhere it starts making maneuvers. maneuvers like i've never seen anything make. it did circles, zig-zags, accelerated rapidly at times, broke left, broke right, broke left then right, anything you can think of that an airplane of any type could never do, it did. i've always kept an open mind to ufos and know that our government has technology like this so i'm not saying that there were aliens aboard or anything, but this was definitely an unidentified flying object. the really amazing thing was that from where i was standing it almost looked like it was in space or maybe near space, regardless it was very far away from my location. yet it's motions at times seemed like a firefly the way it wobbled and changed dirtection. for it to be that far away from me and still move at those speeds and directions really says a lot about it's actual capabilities. it has been 2 1/2 hours now and it is still up there in the same 5 o'clock location. the moon i would say is approximately at 130 degs going east to west or 50 degs going west to east, and the craft is at 5 o'clock from that at 10pm on 1/3/12. truly a sight to see. i wish i had a good camera for taking night shots but the best i have is my cell phone and it would barely show up due to the brightness of the moon. i called a friend of mine who is always telling me about ufos so he could see it for himself. he verified, for my sanity, that he was watching the same thing from 25 miles away from my location.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Definitely a ufo, but my guess would be that this was a test flight

content.detailedDescription:
While watching the nhl winter classic on nbc i noticed something very strange during the intermission between the second and third periods.
a band was performing and as the camera filmed them, at 17:03, a bright rod/cylinder flew into frame above the roof structure on the left field side of the park. it changed directions slightly and quickly accelerated away from the camera.
i recorded this on my dvr and have watched it numerous times and continue to be perplexed.
i'm attempting to download a copy of this from my dvr so i may provide it as an attachment but this video could probably be found on nbc.
content.summary: Viewed during intermission between second and third period of nhl winter classic on nbc

content.detailedDescription: Huge structure located on the moon.  huge!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
content.summary: Hold on here is a disclosure video from the moon

content.detailedDescription: Huge bridge right in the middle of a lunar crater.  its not from erosion, its not from magma..It was either built, or carved out by machine.
content.summary: Huge bridge structure located on the moon

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking out the garbage when i saw the lights appearing over the tree tops. i called my wife and kids out the front door to watch. she went back inside for a video camera and we watched the show from the front door. the vids are posted on youtube. they didnot look like airplanes or helicopters. in fact an airplane flys by in the video clearly showing a contrast to the moving lights. i also called my friend who lives elswhere and he went outside his front door and watched the event from his house. there was one big white ball light that seemed to be accompnied by smaller red/orange lights. the white light hovered while the orange lights moved around in paths sometimes in formation. sometimes three sometimes four orange lights at a time would move about and change directions completely unlike an airplane or helecopter. they could fly in formation or break apart from eachother. sometimes they would disappear into space sometimes they would just go dark. more red/orange lights would appear to take their place. the whole event lasted about 20 minuets or half an hour. in the end the large white light dropped below the treetops taking the smaller orange lights with it. my wife and i where completely excited and wonderous of what we had just seen and recorded. my others around the world have posted the exact same thing over the next few days. here is a link to the vids
[youtube link moved to fi section/cms/tg]
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: One large light ascend, hovering, dropping. several smaller lights ascending, descending, changing directions in formation

content.detailedDescription: I was going outside to get the mail. from the moment i opened the door i noticed a magnificently bright star-like object on the left side of the moon. it caught my attention with its brilliantly bright white star like features. immediately, i thought it was a star until it began to move. the object began to descend down the sky towards the horizon, fast, without speeding up or slowing down. i was thrilled watching it because i was skeptical that i would ever see one again. about half a minute passed as i followed its flight path until the light dimmed and was gone.
content.summary: Went outside to check the mail. a starlike object brighter than polaris sighted next to the moon and i watched in awe as it steadily and silently descended down horzion until it was gone

content.detailedDescription: My brother and i were driving home and both noticed object in clear sky...We noticed the object as it was high in the windshield and very reflective...There were planes in the sky all with long contrails ...This had none...Cold atmosphere...No sign of exhaust...The object appeared stationary for a few seconds then changed direction south, as we were parallel with i-75. it appeared to accellerate at great speed south then almost instantly disappear...Visibility was clear and perfect...We had feeling of witnessing something out of the ordinary.  it was no bird, plane, balloon . we also witnessed what appeared to be a fast moving jet circling the area for a few minutes after we arrived home which was maybe 5 minutes from initial sighting...I continued to watch the sky and noticed the lack of air traffic almost like it was diverted from the area as for that time of day i would have expected to see commercial aircraft...The fast moving jet was no commercial flight...I watched it from my backyard appearing to be patrolling the area...The jet doubled back then went away...It was exciting ! it was no airplane or any vehicle with exhaust...To fly away like it did i estimate thousands of miles per hour...Leo chamberlain
content.summary: Brother and i witnessed a bright object in sky, cigar or saucer shaped that had no control in cold perfect clear sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was inside watching tv when my oldest son josh who is eleven came running inside saying there was a strange light in the sky. me and my wife and other two children went outside to see what he was talking about. and there in the northwest was a star like object moving at a slow rate of speed from northwest to southeast in a straight path. the object had no blinking lights and no sound. we watched the object disappear over the tree tops.
content.summary: A large star like object traveling from northwest to southeast no sound.

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were traveling down the mountain on hwy 11, just above kurtistown, to go see the fireworks on new years (which were cancelled we found later) it was about 11:20pm when we noticed an orange orb on the horizon... we were commenting about it being fireworks or something when we noticed it was getting bigger, and coming closer... directly towards us almost. while still driving, i said it must be a balloon firework or something in the wind... but as it got closer, i could see that there were red peppery beams like rain coming from underneath it, moving back and fourth quickly, so i pulled over to get a better look... (at this point i had a suspicion already...Turned off the car and radio) got out of the car and looked directly at it......And as it was coming closer, i could begin to see inside the "orb" which was only a layer of light glowing around the craft, and inside was a disc shaped craft, with a classic bubble top, spinning, and gyrating, in a rocking motion, syncronius with the tilt of the rainlike red beams, at 1/2 second intervals.... there was also light "spikes" on the top and sides, giving the orb-like shape a triangle overlay kinda. as i was watching this saying "omg, omg... do you see that" my friend told me there was another one...  and there was, coming from the exact same area. they all passed overhead about ten seconds apart...As one dissappeared over the horizon, another would appear, and one would be overhead; so there were 3 visable all the time, one always close overhead scanning, as they all did. we saw 7 total, and very close, maybe 500 feet away as they passed, almost directly overhead. lots of detail in the "lightshow" but the craft were spinning and gyrating, so we couldn't make out small features. the orb shape, and the trialgle points were all bright orange-yellow, but the beams were like red rain scans that abriptly ended about 50 ft below the craft in a circular pattern, as if hitting an invisable surface. they were all identical as far as we could tell. all was silent. i could hear nothing from the sky. but my hair seemed to stand up a bit as each craft passed. it gave me chills and warm flashes. they seemed holographic almost. i am just in shock. they really are here. i have so many questions now...
content.summary: 7 craft, orb sheilds with triangular points, but spinning discs inside, all traveling single-file, scanning, about 10 seconds between each craft traveling to the south from our north
